mapper.select: select MEMBER_SEQ, MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, CRYPT_PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, CELLPHONE, REGISTER_SEQ, REGISTRY_DATE, MODIFIER_SEQ, MODIFY_DATE, ORGANIZATION_SEQ from CIP_MEMBER

select MEMBER_SEQ, MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, CRYPT_PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, CELLPHONE, REGISTER_SEQ, REGISTRY_DATE, MODIFIER_SEQ, MODIFY_DATE, ORGANIZATION_SEQ from CIP_MEMBER where MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CIP_MEMBER ( MEMBER_SEQ, MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, CELLPHONE, REGISTER_SEQ, REGISTRY_DATE, MODIFIER_SEQ, MODIFY_DATE, ORGANIZATION_SEQ ) values( #{MEMBER_SEQ}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{PASSWORD}, #{NAME}, #{EMAIL}, #{CELLPHONE}, #{REGISTER_SEQ}, sysdate, #{MODIFIER_SEQ}, sysdate, #{ORGANIZATION_SEQ} )
mapper.update:
update CIP_MEMBER set MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}, PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD}, CRYPT_PASSWORD = #{CRYPT_PASSWORD}, NAME = #{NAME}, EMAIL = #{EMAIL}, CELLPHONE = #{CELLPHONE}, REGISTER_SEQ = #{REGISTER_SEQ}, REGISTRY_DATE = #{REGISTRY_DATE}, MODIFIER_SEQ = #{MODIFIER_SEQ}, MODIFY_DATE = #{MODIFY_DATE}, ORGANIZATION_SEQ= #{ORGANIZATION_SEQ}
where MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
